content: sir g .. so many thanks for this amazing app...very helpful. sir i am using this paid version app on my android cell phone. i want to use its paid version on my laptop too but from microsoft store i am no getting install due to my VISA CREDIT CARD (INDIA) not accepting. But i always buy APP from this card from google play store...sir help me that i can too buy its paid version for laptop from microsoft store..Or give me idea that i can buy its paid version for laptop...Sir .Plz ADD a ROTATE OPTION and a MAGNIFIRE check and uncheck option for ANDROID that can be use any shape easily with fingertips...
replyContent: Thank you very much for the feedback and feature suggestions. We'd love to help you with the Microsoft Store purchase issue. Please write to us at flowdia.help@gmail.com so that we can help you better.

content: Works well.
replyContent: Hi, please tap the header cell for the UML class shape, you should see a red button with a trash can symbol. Please tap on the button to delete the shape. Thanks.

content: great app! it does everything I was looking for. Had an issue installing the app in my second device and received support within 24hrs.
Ok
Not the first one I've tried, but certainly the best! Easy to use and it covers most situations.
Crash with complex diagrams
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback. We'd love to help you with this issue. Please write to us at flowdia.help@gmail.com so that we can help you better.

content: While I'll continue to use it, I must say that while on paper this is the best diagram making app available on Android so far, it seems to work poorly with tablets (esp with large resolution). In my Tab S6 Lite, the UI keeps glitching and having its parts disappearing when I work with zoomed out canvas and outside first page. Color selection also keeps disappearing when I switch to border color tab. Also, the hand-drawing recognition doesn't work as well as other apps.

The best process flow tools. High recommended. Customer service is extremely responsive in helping me to resolve the issues I faced in installing the apps. After using it for 3 months, I have created more than 20 complex flows in a very short time. Thanks for the amazing software.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your feedback.

content: Update3: never used this app 1- you should decide (not feedback No.s) + 2-Dark Mode will benefit you more than anyone + 3- It's the Most important missing feature, Good Luck (Prev)Still no dark mode or even black background option (Prev2:) Just bought this app. Needs OPTION to set BACKGROUND COLOR, like SimpleMind.. You will like Black for Dark Theme Mode, or any color for background for projects style guidelines within companies. At least start with BLACK BACKGROUND optn first please. Thanks 5*
replyContent: Thanks again for providing your feedback and suggestion. We have a long list of new feature requests and we try to do our best to implement the requests. We understand your requested feature is important to you but the order / priority is based on the number of users requesting the same feature. Thanks again for your patience.

content: A bit pricey, but it does as advertised. My purposes are simple, i just like to visualize generic ideas in a nice orderly and clear fashion. The only thing i would see changed is the color picker, the limited palette is good enough for the free version, but for 6 bucks i would like to have the ability to pick any color, saturation and brightness, and maybe an option to save your own colors. I feel the color palette is lacking but overall its a really useful application.
replyContent: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback. Please reach out to us at flowdia.help@gmail.com, if you have other suggestions.

content: For a full-time project manager this is the best app.. tried all, no one comes close. The interface is like my desk, it had all my tools at hand (no bloody menus) it's efficient, clear and makes effective work intuitive. Thank you for a great app.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Amazing one. Easy to handle
replyContent: Thanks for your review!

content: Can draw anything. But exporting is broken. Right side of exported images is messed up. Arrows go missing, text gets jumbled up. I'm saving as A2 in pdf to print but can't. Help me save things correctly and I will 5 star this
replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback. 
We cannot replicate the issue you are having. Please email us at flowdia.help@gmail.com so we can assist you. Thanks.

content: great app to have - mainly for middle Managers working on the go. very useful.
replyContent: Thanks for your review! Please recommend our app to your friends, and donâ€™t hesitate to shoot us a note at flowdia.help@gmail.com if you have any questions.

content: Quick response from devs. Could use more options in resolution (pixels) opposed to only standard paper sizes. Bold would be better to only apply on selected text rather than applying on all the text within the shape. Could definitely use more font options to make things interesting.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. On Windows platform - please use the Save As button and select "GSP (iOS/Android)" option. .GSP files can be opened on all platforms including Windows.  The Bold text option is available for text shapes in the left menu. Please email us at flowdia.help@gmail.com for assistance. Thanks.

content: Purchased the app with big hopes...however I am disappointed :( First of all the connector lines would overlap the boxes, then there is no way to edit and re-route the connector lines that are automatically generated, next there is no option of grouping the boxes and now after spending hours completing the flowchart, i realise the canvas has somehow moved and the top part of the flowchart (header part of the swimlanes) are no more visible and there is no way of centering my flowchart on the page
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. We have updated the app so that the shapes cannot be moved out of the canvas bounds on the top and left side. Please check for the latest update (1.8.3) in the store. Thanks.

content: Took the plunge and purchased. Needs the ability to link into major cloud storage providers and editing of sequence diagrams needs improvement as it's very cumbersome at the moment (have given some ideas on this now) - Have also purchased the windows version and I'm all round very happy with what this app can do. It really deserves 5 stars and hopefully 1 or 2 extra features will come over time. Thanks
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback and suggestions. We would like to learn more about the suggestions. Please email us at flowdia.help@gmail.com. Thanks.

content: No aggregation or composition arrows...Not great for sysml or uml. Disappointed! ðŸ˜ž
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. Both Composition and Generalisation arrows are available for UML Class shapes. Composition is the one with the filled diamond and Generalisation is the white arrow head.

content: Very easy to draw in but the app is not yet completed? No aggregation? arrows quite strange occasionally? no background color? no infinite space? and by the way, why is export hiding and not on the top bar? But all in all this a great app!

So..limits to 7 swim lanes? It keeps bumping the first lanes whenever I add more than 7. Zooming in/navigating sucks horrendously. Why cant there be an "unlimited" paper size so we can MINDMAP without your limitations? ..with swim lanes. Nice idea but missing the mark so far..so frustrating.
replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback. 
There is no hard limit on the number swimlanes you can add. Simply increase the page size to fit all the swimlanes you would like to add. "Unlimited" page sizing is not possible as, in software, there is a limit to everything. Did you mean "Auto Page Sizing"? This is a feature we have on our wish-list for future releases.

content: Great app. This app has prospect. It would be better if it can be exported to other formats.
This is an extremely user-friendly and surprisingly capable little program that has proven invaluable to me. The best $7 investment I've done in a long time.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback!

content:
Very bad application, too much bugs. Do you really want to earn money by 
hired amateur programmers on this application? Really? How can I get back 
my money?

Please add infinite space asap! Very frustrating that space is so limited. 
This is an expensive app with lots of potential but that is the IMMEDIATE 
problem!

This App look great but is big bug to not save files and ask to contact 
support right now I paid 7.99 for bug software , running on my tablet suck 
and support very amateur need fix ASAP please
replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback,
The reason why this app does not work on your device is because you have illegally installed it on an Amazon Kindle Fire tablet running Amazon's Fire OS which can only run apps certified by Amazon's App Store.

content:
Great app but would be better with alittle more network options and CCTV 
and wireless access points.
Excellent standalone and even better by turning on "Samsung DeX Labs" in DeX settings.  The app becomes a sizable window and works perfectly. I can truly work anywhere now.  Worth every cent!  Note 8
Great app. please add support for Arabic language. also it would be much better if you make the page size more flexible. I want to be able to manually set the width and height of the page. thanks
Excellent
There should have an infinite space just like in autocad... aside from paper sizes... but overall i like it.
Great app, hope to see the grouping and ungrouping of objects.  And maybe a way to group objects and add them to a custom panel so you can drag these custom objects into your workspace.
I bought the app from lite. I can't save files. It want let me import images.  Absolutely no useful instructions
replyContent:
Hi Joe, thanks for the feedback. 
Please email support at flowdia.help@gmail.com so we may be able to assist you with this issue.
Thanks.

content: Really great application. It would be greater if you add the UML class diagrams and the functionality to link different files and pages to a particular diagram, view or class. I am looking forward to see such implementations.
Hi developer, your this app for Android is very good . But there is a problem that I can't let the line at bottom or on top. Could you tell me how to do it?
replyContent:
Hi Herbert, thank you very much for the feedback.
Can you please email support at flowdia.help@gmail.com as we would like to better understand the problem you are having.
thanks.

content: Great app easy to use. The app does need the gsp file association added, so that gsp files will show flowdia in the "open with" context menu.

It's clear, precise & easy to use. I love it. It would be brilliant if the program allowed the 'off page conn' symbol to jump or hyperlink to another desired location of the flowchart on the page in use, or another page. I look forward to future developments with this program. Keep up the good work.
How can I send charts from this app to the PC app??
replyContent:
Hi Seth, thank you for the feedback. 

The desktop app has a lot more features and diagram types currently not supported in the mobile version, hence diagram files created in the mobile and desktop versions are not interchangeable.

If you have any questions or feature suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact support at flowdia.help@gmail.com.

content: It's very good and easily for working, the tool.
Excellent tool for all kinds of flowcharts, mindmaps, even rack diagrams.
Can you add communication equipment to the rack mount and other areas please!.
replyContent:
Hi Lee, thank you very much for the feedback.
We can certainly look at adding new shapes - please email support at flowdia.help@gmail.com with your suggestions on the shapes you would like to see.
Thanks.

content: Very professional app, please add crazy shapes to do charts suitable for kids . Thank you

Thank you for this app, it makes life easier when making flow charts while riding the train! What I would suggest is (1) Allow nodes to link to pages. So I tap a node and can link to another page. Then that node can have a color border indicating it has a page link. Then I tap that node and can jump to the page from there. And (2) a button that jumps to the paid version in the app store. I had to search and then go to the free app, then go to more apps from you just to find the paid version. :)
replyContent: Thank you very much for the feedback and suggestions.

content: Is it possible to implement the option to import transparent vector images? And, freehand doodling. This would be awesome and I'll be happy working with it.
replyContent:
Thank you very much for the feedback and suggestions. 
We will record your suggestions on our feature wishlist for future updates.

content: Had difficulty saving from demo but devs fixed issue. Would be great if I could also edit on my computer. Would get 5 stars if so.
replyContent:
Thank you very much for the feedback. 
The Demo diagram can be exported to Full version as of v1.0.38. 
Simply click on Menu > Exp. Demo File button found in the Demo version.
If you have any questions, suggestions or assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out by email to flowdia.help@gmail.com.

content: Quickly drew that what I need in an instant to remotely access servers and understand data flow. I use it for processes and home automation information, login credentials, and that what you need quickly without guessing. Very handy.

This is an excellent flow chart app with a very intuitive user interface.  The ability to export to pdf is particularly useful for sharing and collaborating with others. All up, this program took me about 2 minutes to learn how to use. Thanks for the great app! Keep up the great work!
